## Hooks.filter() method

Filter a value

Signature:

```typescript
filter<T extends keyof Hooks.Map & string>(id: T, value?: Hooks.Map[T] | ((value?: Hooks.Map[T]) => Hooks.Map[T])): Hooks.Map[T];
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                                                                                            | Description |
| --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| id        | T                                                                                                                                                               |             |
| value     | [Hooks.Map](/api/bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\] &#124; ((value?: [Hooks/Map](//bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\]) =&gt; [Hooks/Map](//bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\]) |             |

Returns:

[Hooks.Map](/api/bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\]

## Example

```js
bud.hooks.filter("namespace.name.event", ["array", "of", "items"]);
```
